data.system_settings: MacBook Air Early 2015, MacOS High Sierra 10.13.4, Google Chrome Stable 66.0.3359.181
data.actual_result: The modal you opened will hitchhike with you to the invite page and is fully interactable.
data.expected_result: Discord shows the page in full focus.
data.short_description: Pressing the back button to get far enough back to get at an invite link while a modal is open will bring it with you.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any invite link(can be invalid) - Open a fullscreen modal - Press the back button until you are at the invite link
